# Function to count passes before each goal
moves_before_goal <- function(goal_index, events_df) {
  goal_event <- events_df %>% filter(index == goal_index)
  team_id <- goal_event$possession_team.name
  
  # Loop through events backwards from the goal event
  event_list = list()
  for (i in (goal_index):1) {
    event <- events_df[i, ]
    
    # Stop if possession changes to a different team
    if (event$possession_team.name != goal_event$possession_team.name |
        !(event$type.name %in% c("Ball Receipt*",
                                 "Pass",
                                 "Carry",
                                 "Pressure",
                                 "Dribble",
                                 "Dribbled Past",
                                 "Shield",
                                 "50/50",
                                 "Shot")) |
        event$pass.outcome.name %in% c("Out", "Incomplete")) {
      break
    }
    
    # add event to the list
    event_list[[length(event_list) + 1]] <- event
    
  }
  
  # Convert the list to a dataframe
  events_before_goal_df <- do.call(rbind, event_list)
  return(events_before_goal_df)
}

# plot the pass map
passmap_plot <- function(data) {
  
  data <- data %>%
    mutate(x=unlist(lapply(location, function(v) as.numeric(v[1]))),
           y=unlist(lapply(location, function(v) as.numeric(v[2]))),
           pass_end_x=unlist(lapply(pass.end_location, function(v) ifelse(is.null(v), NA, as.numeric(v[1])))),
           pass_end_y=unlist(lapply(pass.end_location, function(v) ifelse(is.null(v), NA, as.numeric(v[2])))),
           carry_end_x=unlist(lapply(carry.end_location, function(v) ifelse(is.null(v), NA, as.numeric(v[1])))),
           carry_end_y=unlist(lapply(carry.end_location, function(v) ifelse(is.null(v), NA, as.numeric(v[2]))))) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    filter(!(type.name %in% c("Pressure", "Dribbled Past", "Ball Receipt*", "Carry"))) %>%
    mutate(row_number = row_number()) %>%
    mutate(prev_x = lag(x), 
           prev_y = lag(y),
           prev_pass_end_x = lag(pass_end_x),
           prev_pass_end_y = lag(pass_end_y))
  
  # plot passes and carries on pitch (including linear model of best fit line)
  # create custom legend
  if(nrow(data)==1){
    create_Pitch() +
      geom_point(data = data, aes(x = x, y = y, size=13, alpha=0.5)) +
      geom_text(data = data, aes(x = x, y = y, label = row_number), 
                size = 3, color = "red", vjust = -1) +
      scale_y_reverse() +
      theme_pitch() +
      ggtitle(paste0("Shot at Goal (no passing sequence)")) +
      theme(plot.title = element_text(size = 20, face = "bold"),
            plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 16),
            legend.position="none")
  }
  else{
    create_Pitch() +
      geom_point(data = data, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
      geom_segment(data = data, aes(x = x, y = y, xend = pass_end_x, yend = pass_end_y, linetype = "Passes", color = "Passes"),
                   arrow = arrow(length = unit(0.08, "inches"))) +
      geom_segment(data = data, aes(x = prev_pass_end_x, y = prev_pass_end_y, xend = x, yend = y, linetype = "Carries", color = "Carries")) +
      
      geom_text(data = data, aes(x = x, y = y, label = row_number), 
                size = 5, color = "red", vjust = -1) +
      
      geom_smooth(data = data, aes(x = x, y = y, linetype = "Avg Direction of Play", color = "Avg Direction of Play"), method = "lm", se = FALSE) +
      
      scale_y_reverse() +
      
      
      scale_linetype_manual(name = "Legend",
                            values = c("Passes" = "solid", "Carries" = "dotted", "Avg Direction of Play" = "solid")) +
      scale_color_manual(name = "Legend",
                         values = c("Passes" = "black", "Carries" = "black", "Avg Direction of Play" = "blue")) +
      guides(linetype = guide_legend(override.aes = list(color = c("black", "blue", "black")))) +
      theme_pitch() +
      theme(legend.position = "right")
  }
  
}

# interactive passing sequence shiny app
ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("Interactive Passing Path to Goal"),
  
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      selectInput("team_input", "Select Team", choices = unique(leverkusen_23_24_events$team.name)),
      selectInput("match_input", "Select Match", choices = unique(leverkusen_23_24_matches$match_name)),
      selectInput("goal_index", "Select Goal Index", choices = NULL)
    ),
    
    mainPanel(
      plotOutput("passmap"),
      fluidRow(
        #column(6, tableOutput('playersInMove')),
        column(6, tableOutput('goalScorer'))
      )
    )
  )
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  
  observe({
    match_goals <- leverkusen_23_24_events %>%
      filter(match_name == input$match_input & possession_team.name == input$team_input &
               shot.outcome.name == "Goal" & shot.type.name == "Open Play") %>%
      select(timestamp_readable)

    updateSelectInput(session, "goal_index", choices = match_goals$timestamp_readable)
  })

  # selected_events <- reactive({
  #   req(input$match_id, input$goal_index)
  #   aMatch <- leverkusen_23_24_events %>% filter(match_id == input$match_id)
  #   moves_before_goal(input$goal_index, aMatch)
  # })
  
  output$passmap <- renderPlot({
    # req(selected_events())
    aMatch <- leverkusen_23_24_events %>% filter(match_name == input$match_input)
    print(unique(aMatch$match_id))
    # get index for the selected timestamp
    goal_index = aMatch %>% filter(timestamp_readable==input$goal_index & shot.outcome.name=="Goal") %>% pull(index)
    print(goal_index)

    events_before_goal = moves_before_goal(goal_index, aMatch)

    passes_before_goal <- events_before_goal %>%
      select(c(index, type.name, player.name, pass.recipient.name, location, pass.end_location, carry.end_location)) %>%
      arrange(index)

    passes_before_goal[passes_before_goal == "NULL"] <- NA
    par(mar = c(0.1, 0.1, 0.1, 0.1))
    passmap_plot(passes_before_goal)
  })

  output$playersInMove <- renderTable({
    aMatch <- leverkusen_23_24_events %>% filter(match_name == input$match_input)
    goal_index <- aMatch %>% filter(timestamp_readable == input$goal_index & shot.outcome.name == "Goal") %>% pull(index)

    events_before_goal <- moves_before_goal(goal_index, aMatch)
    players_involved <- events_before_goal %>%
      arrange(index) %>%
      filter(team.name==input$team_input & type.name %in% c("Pass", "Shot")) %>%
      mutate(row_number = row_number()) %>%
      select(row_number, player.name) %>%
      rename(`Order of Players Involvement`= player.name, `No.` = row_number)

    players_involved
  })
  
  output$goalScorer <- renderTable({
    aMatch <- leverkusen_23_24_events %>% filter(match_name == input$match_input)
    scorer <- aMatch %>% filter(timestamp_readable == input$goal_index & shot.outcome.name == "Goal") %>%
      select(player.name) %>%
      rename(`Goal Scorer` = player.name)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
